description: Netflix is a popular streaming service that offers a vast library of movies and TV shows, including original content, for a monthly subscription fee.
Hulu is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of current and classic TV shows, movies, and original content, available for a monthly subscription fee.

Prime Video is a streaming service that offers a large selection of movies, TV shows, and original content, available as part of an Amazon Prime subscription, or as a standalone service for a monthly fee.
Disney+ is a streaming service that provides access to a vast library of movies and TV shows from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, and more, for a monthly subscription fee.
